channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Electronics -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Electronics -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7811|2024-08-04T09:41:01.898Z -- samsung%20electronics -- samsung%20update
item.description: Samsung Update 3.0.2.0 ~ 3.0.32.0 has a vulnerability that allows privilege escalation as commands crafted by attacker are executed while the engine deserializes the data received during inter-process communication
